author: MarketScreener
title: Transnet's major union rejects wage deal agreed by rival | MarketScreener Canada
text:
March 27 (Reuters) - South Africa's United National Transport Union (UNTU) said on Thursday it rejected a final wage offer tabled by state-owned logistics group Transnet, which was signed by a smaller union.
Transnet on Thursday announced a three-year pay agreement with the South African Transport and Allied Workers' Union (SATAWU) to replace the current wage deal which expires on March 31. SATAWU confirmed the agreement in a separate statement.
Under the deal agreed with SATAWU, Transnet will implement 6% wage increases in the first two years of the new agreement and a 5.5% raise in the third year.
UNTU, which represents more than half the workforce at Transnet, declared a deadlock in the wage talks, saying it wants a 10% increase across the board and a single-year agreement, among other demands.
"UNTU is fully prepared to take to the streets and mobilise our 25,000-plus members to secure a liveable, just and fair agreement," it said in a statement.
Transnet said it remained "positive that this offer will be accepted by all employees".
"Transnet considers the offer to be reasonable and fair given the current financial and operational challenges," the firm said. (Reporting by Nelson Banya; Editing by Mrigank Dhaniwala)

author: Investing.com
title: Fastenal nombra nueva Vicepresidenta Ejecutiva de Estrategia y Comunicaciones Por Investing.com
text:
WINONA, Minn. - Fastenal Company (NASDAQ: FAST ), un actor principal en el mercado de suministros industriales, ha anunciado la promoción de Donnalee K. Papenfuss al cargo de Vicepresidenta Ejecutiva de Estrategia y Comunicaciones, puesto que será efectivo a partir del 1 de noviembre de 2024. Papenfuss, quien ha estado en la empresa desde 1999, liderará el departamento de marketing y encabezará iniciativas estratégicas centradas en tecnología, ventas y prácticas ambientales, sociales y de gobernanza (ESG). Su función también abarcará la mejora de las estrategias de comunicación para respaldar estas iniciativas y asegurar que estén alineadas con los objetivos comerciales más amplios de Fastenal.
La promoción de Papenfuss llega tras una larga trayectoria en Fastenal, donde recientemente ocupaba el cargo de Vicepresidenta de Desarrollo y Apoyo de Contratos desde febrero de 2014. Sus responsabilidades en ese puesto incluían liderar equipos que apoyaban las ventas a través de herramientas, recursos y facilitación de negociaciones contractuales. Su influencia se extendía a la supervisión del chatbot interno de Fastenal, Blue, y a la dirección de la Comunidad de Práctica ESG. Además, ha desempeñado un papel fundamental en el proceso de planificación estratégica de la empresa junto con otros ejecutivos.
El CEO de Fastenal, Dan Florness, elogió a Papenfuss por su desarrollo profesional y contribuciones a la empresa, expresando su entusiasmo por el liderazgo y la visión que aportará a su nuevo cargo. Florness destacó la continua evolución de la empresa como socio tecnológico en la cadena de suministro.
Fastenal atiende a una base diversa de clientes, proporcionando suministros industriales y de construcción a través de una extensa red de más de 3.500 ubicaciones en 25 países. El enfoque de la empresa combina inventario local, experiencia y soluciones digitales para ofrecer ahorros en productos y procesos a lo largo de la cadena de suministro. Esta estrategia se resume en su lema: "Donde la Industria se encuentra con la Innovación".
La información de este anuncio se basa en un comunicado de prensa de Fastenal Company.
En otras noticias recientes, Fastenal Company reportó un aumento del 3,5% en las ventas netas y un incremento del 1% en las ganancias por acción hasta 0,52 dólares en su informe de resultados del tercer trimestre de 2024. A pesar de las interrupciones causadas por el huracán Helene, la tasa de ventas diarias de la empresa creció un 1,9%. Fastenal también firmó 93 nuevas ubicaciones Onsite, aumentando los sitios activos en un 12%, y vio un incremento del 25,5% en las ventas de comercio electrónico, que representaron el 61,1% de las ventas totales.
Las firmas de inversión Baird, Loop Capital y Stephens han elevado recientemente sus objetivos de precio para Fastenal a 80, 72 y 75 dólares respectivamente, manteniendo calificaciones neutrales. Estas mejoras reflejan la exitosa ejecución de ventas de Fastenal y los desarrollos positivos dentro de la empresa.
Fastenal aspira a alcanzar entre 375 y 400 ubicaciones Onsite activas. También proyecta un rendimiento estable para el cuarto trimestre y anticipa menores gastos de capital en 2025 en comparación con la tasa actual de 250 millones de dólares. La empresa se ha fijado un objetivo de 10.000 millones de dólares en ingresos futuros, con planes de añadir 1.000 millones de dólares anualmente.
Las estrategias de Fastenal para lograr estos objetivos de ingresos se detallarán en un Día del Analista programado para abril, según se reveló en la conferencia de resultados del tercer trimestre de 2024. A pesar de que la actividad del mercado en general sigue siendo lenta, la dirección de Fastenal expresó una perspectiva cautelosamente optimista, anticipando que la cuota de mercado de la empresa podría seguir aumentando hasta 2025.
Perspectivas de InvestingPro
Mientras Fastenal Company se prepara para la transición de Donnalee K. Papenfuss a su nuevo cargo ejecutivo, los datos financieros recientes de InvestingPro arrojan luz sobre la posición actual de la empresa en el mercado y su rendimiento.
La capitalización bursátil de Fastenal se sitúa en 44.380 millones de dólares, reflejando su importante presencia en el sector de suministros industriales. Los ingresos de la empresa en los últimos doce meses hasta el tercer trimestre de 2024 alcanzaron los 7.480 millones de dólares, con un modesto crecimiento del 2,7% en el mismo período. Este crecimiento, aunque no explosivo, se alinea con el enfoque constante de Fastenal hacia la expansión del negocio y su énfasis en convertirse en un socio tecnológico de la cadena de suministro, como destacó el CEO Dan Florness.
Un consejo de InvestingPro destaca que Fastenal ha mantenido el pago de dividendos durante 32 años consecutivos, demostrando un compromiso con los retornos a los accionistas que complementa sus iniciativas estratégicas. Esta consistencia en los dividendos podría ser particularmente atractiva para los inversores que buscan ingresos estables junto con las perspectivas de crecimiento de la empresa.
Otro consejo relevante de InvestingPro señala que Fastenal cotiza cerca de su máximo de 52 semanas, lo que puede reflejar la confianza del mercado en la dirección de la empresa y en los cambios de liderazgo como la promoción de Papenfuss. Sin embargo, los inversores deben tener en cuenta que la acción también cotiza con un múltiplo de ganancias elevado, lo que sugiere altas expectativas de rendimiento futuro.
Para los lectores interesados en un análisis más profundo, InvestingPro ofrece 13 consejos adicionales sobre Fastenal, proporcionando una visión integral de la salud financiera de la empresa y su posición en el mercado.
Este artículo ha sido generado y traducido con el apoyo de AI y revisado por un editor. Para más información, consulte nuestros T&C.

author: Sergio Valdez Báez
title: Meteorología prevé tiempo severo con tormentas eléctricas - Clima - ABC Color
text: Clima Los cinco departamentos en zona de tormentas para esta noche La Dirección de Meteorología e Hidrología (DMH) prevé la presencia de tiempo severo con tormentas eléctricas en cinco departamentos del noreste del país. Sería para el final de la tarde y el ingreso de la noche de este jueves. Por ABC Color 02 de enero de 2025 - 20:10 Lluvia en el Chaco. (archivo).

author: Troy O. Fritzhand
title: Israeli Tech Remains Resilient Despite War, Says New Report
text:
Stock ticker. Photo: Ahmad Ardity/Wikimedia Commons.
Israel’s Startup Nation Central, an Israel-based NGO, released its annual Israeli Tech Ecosystem report for 2023 this week, highlighting the growth in the country’s tech sector and with outlooks for 2024.
According to the report, the country has 7272 tech companies that have received funding from a total of 353 investors. Total funding, spread across categories, topped $23.5 billion, with $7.9 billion alone coming in private rounds. The amounts are a drop from previous years, with $17.7 billion in private money coming in 2022 and a remarkable $29.4 billion in 2021. This falls in line with global tech funding that saw a spike during the Covid-19 pandemic, and which subsequently dropped in 2022 and 2023. For example, the US saw a 51% drop in funding from 2021-2023, Europe 52%, and Asia 60%.
Despite the war currently raging, funding for the fourth quarter of 2023 is estimated at $2.1 billion – the lowest of the fiscal year but an indictor at that there is still interest in the sector. Most of this money, as has been the norm for most of Israel’s tech history, comes from foreign investors. The breakdown for 2023 was 43.8% foreign only, 39.5% foreign and Israeli, and 16.7% only Israeli investment. This is very much in line with the previous six years.
Israel’s tech sector is notable for achievements and innovations in cybersecurity – in many thanks to its necessity due to constant security threats. As such, the sector saw the largest intake in funding for the year with $1.9 billion. The sector with the most absolute investments – 150 – was the health tech field. The country has a high rate of research output and favorable private/public partnerships between the major hospital systems, allowing for new technology to be tested and scaled more easily than other countries.
Benjamin Weiss, a partner at Softbank, told the report that he is bullish on the future of the industry, saying “Israel continues to stand at the forefront of the development of next generation technologies in areas including Cyber, Artificial Intelligence and Semiconductors.”
Due to the war, Yonatan Mandelbaum, a partner at TLV Partners, said “I believe we will begin to see a new cohort of even more ambitious companies coming out of Israel in industries that have been historically overlooked such as: defense, manufacturing and critical infrastructure.”
2023 also saw 52 Israeli companies being bought out, totaling $3.5 billion. Twelve of these sales happened during the war, even higher than the second sector of 2023. Notable sales were Imperva, a cybersecurity company, being bought by French company Thales for $3.6 billion Talon Cyber Security being bought by Israeli founded Palo Alto Networks for $625 million, Axis Security being bought by Hewlett Packard for $500 million, and Dig Security also being purchased by Palo Alto for $350 million.
As the war rages in the south and the potential for an expansion to the north with Lebanon, optimism still reigns supreme in the sector. According to Startup Nation Central, 89% of respondents said they were optimistic about the future of the sector in Israel, and 79% said they see the industry as resilient. They also surveyed multinational companies, 88% of which said they would either maintain or expand their operations in Israel.
Lotan Levkowitz, the general partner at Grove Ventures, said “In 2024 entrepreneurship is more than a job – it’s about resilient founders facing challenges head-on. Despite a tough funding scene, only the strongest will prevail, shaping a tech landscape defined by grit and excellence.”
The CEO of Startup Nation Central, Avi Hasson, added “Heading into 2024, the Israeli tech ecosystem faces significant challenges, but I am hopeful that the ecosystem’s bedrock of innovation, global partnership, and proven resilience will steer it through uncertainties and toward a continued growth trajectory; Israel remains an innovation hub and an ecosystem with significant investment opportunities.”

author: Teresa Paula Costa com redação
title: IVA Zero beneficiou os consumidores, diz economista João Duque - Renascença
text: 28 dez, 2023 - 17:52 • [Teresa Paula Costa](https://rr.sapo.pt/artigo/33588/teresa-paula-costa) com redação O IVA Zero no cabaz de bens alimentares essenciais teve impacto positivo na vida das pessoas, disse esta quinta-feira o economista João Duque. Em declarações à Renascença, João Duque afirmou que “não há a mínima dúvida de que houve um benefício” para as pessoas, dado que “os intermediários, a rede de retalho, ficaram mesmo com IVA Zero”. Contudo, “com o evoluir dos preços durante o ano, esse benefício rapidamente foi comido e as pessoas acabam por não sentir, porque, na prática, também não era muito significativo o valor do IVA Zero, porque se aplicava a produtos em que o IVA já era muito baixo em muitos casos”, explicou. Isso justifica a perceção das pessoas de que a medida introduzida pelo Governo não resultou. Os consumidores reconhecem o benefício de IVA Zero(...) Questionado sobre o comportamento dos consumidores neste final de ano, o economista não se mostrou surpreendido. “Sinceramente, acho que era de esperar, porque os aumentos salariais da maior parte dos portugueses ocorreram muito no início do ano de 2023, e a inflação continua a fazer sentir-se durante todo o ano e, portanto, vamos tendo cada vez menos folga”, explicou. Por outro lado, “em cima da inflação, há um problema que afeta muitos portugueses que, de facto, foi o aumento das taxas de juro e o acréscimo muito significativo dos valores que pagam mensalmente para amortização do capital de juros”. Tendo também em conta “o facto das poupanças feitas durante a pandemia já se terem ido por outras vias“, os portugueses debatem-se com falta de dinheiro e esperam que “no próximo mês, mesmo com o IVA aumentado, talvez os aumentos salariais e as atualizações salariais de que venham a beneficiar, possam compensar”. Sobre a possibilidade de virem a ser criados outros apoios, o economista disse acreditar que sim, mas “para os que mais necessitam.”

title: Turn the Party Up a Notch with Rebound Party Rentals-- Book Now!
text:
Elevate Your Occasion With High-Quality Celebration Rentals
When intending an occasion, it is crucial to create an atmosphere that leaves an enduring impact on your visitors. One means to attain this is by using top quality celebration leasings. These rentals can elevate your event to the next degree, providing both functionality and aesthetic allure. From elegant furniture to state-of-the-art audiovisual tools, event rentals supply a large range of alternatives to fit your certain requirements. By leasing instead of buying, you can save time, storage space, and money area, while still offering your guests with a memorable experience. In this guide, we will certainly check out the different sorts of event services offered, the advantages of renting out, ideas for selecting the best services, and exactly how to enhance your occasion's atmosphere. So, let's dive into the world of high-quality event leasings and elevate your following event to brand-new elevations.
Sorts Of Celebration Rentals
One important element of event preparation is selecting the proper event rentals to improve the ambience and meet the particular requirements of your visitors. Party leasings can be found in numerous kinds, each offering a different objective and adding an unique element to your occasion. One preferred sort of party rental is furniture. From elegant chairs and tables to fashionable lounge seats, furnishings rentals can transform any type of location right into a comfortable and visually appealing room. Lights rentals are one more crucial element of event planning. Whether it's ambient lighting to create a warm and inviting environment or vibrant uplighting to set the mood, lighting leasings can greatly impact the overall ambiance of your occasion. For exterior events, tent rentals provide sanctuary and defense against unpredictable weather. With various sizes and styles available, tents can suit a tiny celebration or a large occasion. Audiovisual leasings, such as audio systems and projectors, are crucial for events that need presentations or enjoyment. These rentals ensure that your visitors can see and hear everything clearly. Last but not least, linens and tableware leasings add a touch of elegance and class to any type of occasion. From napkins and table linens to fine china and glassware, these leasings complete the total look of your event. By thoroughly picking the proper party services, you can elevate your occasion and create a remarkable experience for your guests.
Advantages of Renting Celebration Tools
When it concerns intending an occasion, there are numerous benefits to renting out party devices that can improve the total experience for both guests and hosts alike. One of the primary benefits of renting out party devices is the cost-effectiveness it uses. Buying all the required devices for a celebration can be pricey, specifically if it is a single occasion. Renting out allows hosts to access high-quality equipment without the need to make a large upfront financial investment. In addition, renting out event equipment gives hosts with a large range of choices and versatility. They can pick from a variety of motifs, designs, and dimensions to fit their certain requirements and preferences. When the event is over, renting out likewise gets rid of the requirement for storage space as the equipment can be returned. Renting out celebration devices saves hosts from the problem of upkeep and fixings. Rental business are accountable for ensuring that the devices is in good functioning condition, eliminating any type of issues about tools malfunctioning during the occasion. In general, leasing party devices offers ease, cost financial savings, and satisfaction, making it a wise selection for event organizers.
Choosing the Right Celebration Rentals for Your Occasion
Firstly, think about the type of occasion you are holding and the theme or ambience you want to create. This will certainly assist you identify which celebration leasings are required.
Following, think about the size of your event and the number of visitors going to. Ensure that you have sufficient seating, tables, and tableware to suit everybody comfortably. It's constantly better to have a couple of additional services than to run out throughout the event.
Additionally, consider the venue's needs and limitations. Some venues might have limitations on the sorts of services enabled or may need specific configurations. See to it to interact with your rental firm and the venue to make certain everything remains in conformity.
Finally, take into consideration the quality of the event rentals. High-quality services can enhance the general experience for your visitors and develop a more aesthetically enticing event. Check the services

Tips for Setting Up and Utilizing Celebration Services
Implementing reliable approaches for establishing and utilizing party rentals can considerably boost the total success and
a knockout post satisfaction of your occasion. Below are some pointers to help you take advantage of your party rentals:
- Plan ahead: Prior to the event, develop a comprehensive design of the room and establish where each rental thing will certainly be positioned. This will aid you enhance the flow of the event and ensure that everything fits perfectly.
- Take into consideration the theme: Pick event services that line up with the theme or concept of your occasion. This will certainly produce a aesthetically attractive and cohesive ambience for your visitors.
- Quality is essential: Choose top quality party services to make certain sturdiness and performance. This will minimize any kind of prospective problems during the event and provide a favorable experience for your guests.
- Establish up and examination beforehand: Designate sufficient time for establishing up the rentals and check them prior to the event starts. This will permit you to deal with any type of problems or make required adjustments in advance of time.
- Supply clear instructions: If you are leasing tools that requires specific directions for procedure, see to it to give clear and concise instructions to your guests. This will certainly prevent any type of problems or accidents and make sure a smooth experience for every person.
Enhancing Your Event Environment With Celebration Rentals
To guarantee a aesthetically attractive and cohesive ambience for your occasion, it is necessary to improve the ambiance by thoroughly incorporating and picking event rentals that align with your style or idea. Celebration services play an important function in changing an ordinary location right into a room that reflects the desired mood and style. Whether you are hosting a formal gala, a casual backyard event, or a themed celebration, the best celebration leasings can boost your occasion and leave a long-term impact on your visitors.
One means to boost your occasion ambience is by picking the suitable furnishings services. The furnishings you select should not only be useful but additionally enhance the general style and aesthetics of your event. Take into consideration the design, shade, and style of the furnishings to produce a cohesive look and really feel. From elegant lounge seating to rustic farmhouse tables, there is a vast array of alternatives readily available to match any type of event design.
Furthermore, lighting can have a significant effect on the atmosphere of your occasion - Rebound Party Rentals. Strategic placement of lighting aspects such as chandeliers, string lights, and uplighting can develop a warm and welcoming environment. Lighting can additionally be utilized to highlight specific locations or focal points, adding depth and visual rate of interest to your occasion area
Lastly, do not ignore the power of decorative components. From table linens and focal points to drapery and backgrounds, these small details can make a large distinction in boosting the general ambience. Choose decoration that complements your motif and includes a touch of character to your occasion.
Verdict
In final thought, including high-quality celebration services right into your event can
go to these guysconsiderably elevate the general ambience and experience. By renting celebration devices, you can save time and money while additionally ensuring that you have all the needed things to make your occasion a success. From choosing the ideal services to establishing them up and using them successfully, these pointers can aid improve any kind of occasion and develop a memorable experience for all attendees.
